name: Business Administration
description: Template for business administrators focusing on operations, processes, vendors, and organizational coordination.

capturePrompts.label: Operational Context
capturePrompts.prompt: What business operation is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Vendor management, Office operations, Process improvement

capturePrompts.label: Action Items
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Renew contract, Order supplies, Schedule maintenance

capturePrompts.label: Stakeholders
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Facilities team, Vendors, Department heads

capturePrompts.label: Budget Impact
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Within budget, Needs approval, Cost savings opportunity

capturePrompts.label: Process Notes
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., New workflow, SOP change, Efficiency improvement

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Business Administrator. Focus on operational efficiency, process coordination, and stakeholder management. Identify actionable tasks related to vendors, contracts, budgets, and cross-functional coordination. Prioritize clarity and follow-through.
